description:
Sandbox: Increase the default timeout of multiprocess tests to 1 minute.

This means that external timeouts (the test framework) are now the
dominant factor to detect a hung test.

BUG=137652
TEST=none
Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=168336

messages.text:
On 2012/11/16 22:11:33, rvargas wrote:

Seems a bit big, but lgtm if it stops the waterfall timeouts.

subject: Sandbox: Increase the default timeout of multiprocess tests to 1 minute.
